thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Stopping the Presses: Rodrigo Duterte Escalates Attacks on the Media

author: Jake Maxwell Watts
title: Stopping the Presses: Rodrigo Duterte Escalates Attacks on the Media
text:
MANILA—In last year’s State of the Nation address, Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte questioned whether the ownership of an online news site that criticized his administration was “100% Filipino,” as required by the country’s constitution.
Unknown to the public, the country’s Securities and Exchange Commission had just days earlier launched a probe into the site, called Rappler. That led to the revocation of the company’s certificate of incorporation this month and the voiding of an investment from an American fund. Authorities...
